name: corrupt_data
description:
Real Note: This is my first actual game. Don't put hate on it as I tried to make this in 3 weeks. And also if the game is actually undone (like the screenshots) that's because my pc is so BAD that if I went any further the game would be unplayable and I won't be able to test or work anymore on it.

I don't know what went wrong. I just had the dream of creating a small and simple RPG game. But one moment passes, it all went wrong. EVERYTHING went wrong. 

I don't recommend you play this game. It's not a 'dare' or anything, but your fate is unknown and anything could happen.

3 weeks of work. The project is enough. I don't wanna work anymore on it - it's too heavy for me. I can't handle the disturbing imagery and sounds. Please..

play at your own risk!

Tried to make it in 

Unity 2019.1-2019.2a

Photoshop 2019

Audacity

Blender 2.8
